title: Classifying by computer
brief_description: Explains how statistical treatment of survey data and construction of a classification can be done by a suitably programmed computer. Takes us step by step thorugh the process from collection of data, through programming, to final results.
description: Explains how statistical treatment of survey data and construction of a classification can be done by a suitably programmed computer. Takes us step by step thorugh the process from collection of data, through programming, to final results.
